choices.text:
This creamy eggplant chicken recipe is a delicious way to add some extra flavour to your dinner table. I love the combination of the savoury eggplant, the sweet onion, and the tanginess of the Greek yoghurt. The result is an incredibly tasty and hearty main dish.

To create this recipe, I started off by cutting chicken into cubes and then marinating them in a mixture of yogurt, garlic, and spices. This adds tremendous flavour to the chicken and helps tenderize the meat. Next, I chopped an onion and sautéed it in a pan with a bit of oil until it began to brown. Then I added in the eggplant cubes and cooked it all together until the vegetables were soft and beginning to caramelize. Finally, I added the marinated chicken and cooked it until it was cooked through.

To finish off the dish, I added Greek yoghurt, which adds a lovely creaminess. This is optional, but I highly recommend it. Once everything was cooked through, I served the creamy eggplant chicken with some fresh parsley, for a bit of colour.

Nutritional Information Per Serving:

Calories: 250

Fat: 5g

Carbs: 15g

Protein: 25g

This is a great way to add some quick, healthy protein to your dinner table. The creamy eggplant and onion provide a delicious, slightly sweet flavour while the Greek yoghurt adds a lovely creaminess. The marinated chicken helps to tenderize the meat and infuse the dish with flavour, making it a truly lip-smacking meal!
